storyscript.dialogue: Hello, I am the owner of the groove sushi house.
storyscript.speaker: Master

storyscript.dialogue: Hello master. I am the developer of this game.
storyscript.speaker: Developer

storyscript.dialogue: So, what do you want to order today?
storyscript.speaker: Master

storyscript.dialogue:
That is, honestly, a good question.
I have no idea what to order.
storyscript.speaker: Developer

storyscript.dialogue:
You look fairly confused. 
How about some energizer?
storyscript.speaker: Master
